bio: Diego is a Frontend developer highly focused on learning and apply the best technologies and practices in the front-end development world. Always focused on writing readable, modular, testable and maintainable code aiming to enhance the end user experience. Able to participate in all the areas of the software development process from concept analysis, execution, testing and deployment.  With good knowledge on the Javascript programming language and experience working with ES6,  ReactJs and VueJs  and able to build markup from designs with HTML5 and CSS3 (Sass, postCSS).
